S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3856: difference between Embedded vs DerbyNetClient in format of return from timestamp(cast(? as varchar(32)))
backporting change #952581 from trunk to 10.5 branch.
Stop caching the original input string in the parse methods of SQLDate and SQLTimestamp, and instead generate (and cache) a normalized datetime string on the first call to getString().
